Name: state
Description: Indicates to the state and its dependent protocol

Name: sttl
Description: Source to destination time to live value

Name: dttl
Description: Destination to source time to live value

Name: service
Description: http ftp smtp ssh dns ftp-data irc and (-) if not much used service

Name: smeansz
Description: Mean of the flow packet size transmitted by the src

Name: dmeansz
Description: Mean of the flow packet size transmitted by the dst

Name: trans_depth
Description: The depth into the connection of http request/response transaction

Name: res_bdy_len
Description: The content size of the data transferred from the server response

Name: tcprtt
Description: TCP connection setup round-trip time the sum of synack and ackdat

Name: synack
Description: TCP connection setup time the time between the SYN and the SYN_ACK packets

Name: ackdat
Description: TCP connection setup time the time between the SYN_ACK and the ACK packets

Name: is_sm_ips_ports
Description: If source equals to destination IP addresses and port numbers are equal this variable takes value 1 else 0

Name: ct_state_ttl
Description: No for each state according to specific range of values for source/destination time to live

Name: ct_flw_http_mthd
Description: No of flows that has methods such as Get and Post in http service

Name: is_ftp_login
Description: If the ftp session is accessed by user and password then 1 else 0

Name: ct_ftp_cmd
Description: No of flows that has a command in ftp session

Name: ct_srv_src
Description: No of connections that contain the same service and source address in 100 connections according to the last time

Name: ct_srv_dst
Description: No of connections that contain the same service and destination address in 100 connections according to the last time

Name: ct_dst_ltm
Description: No of connections of the same destination address in 100 connections according to the last time

Name: ct_src_ltm
Description: No of connections of the same source address in 100 connections according to the last time

Name: ct_src_dport_ltm
Description: No of connections of the same source address and the destination port in 100 connections according to the last time

Name: ct_dst_sport_ltm
Description: No of connections of the same destination address and the source port in 100 connections according to the last time

Name: ct_dst_src_ltm
Description: No of connections of the same source and the destination address in in 100 connections according to the last time

Name: attack_cat
Description: The name of each attack category In this data set nine categories e.g. Fuzzers Reconnaissance Backdoor DoS Exploits Analysis Generic Shellcode Worms
